eng: Excuse me, how much does this cost?
Can you show me another color, please?
Is this the final price or can you give a discount?
tu: unduve final ah ath kammi malpuvara

eng: Do you take UPI or card payments?
tu: mulu UPI dethonvara ath card dethonvara

eng: Can you pack this nicely?
tu: unden onjji shok d pack malthudh korpara

eng: Is it made locally?
Id like to buy some souvenirs
tu: yenk kelav nenapu da kanike dethonere undu

eng: Do you have anything handmade?
Can you give me two of these?
Is this fresh?
How much for one kilo of mangoes?
Are these bananas from Mangalore?
Can I taste a small piece?
Do you sell tender coconuts here?
Is this spice very strong?
Can you clean and cut the fruit for me?
tu: yenk undu phala n clean malth cut malthudh korpara?

eng: Whats the local name for this vegetable?
tu: undu tharakari g urudu dada ndh leppuver?

eng: Is this jaggery or sugar?
Do you have snacks like banana chips or chakuli?
tu: parndh dha chips ejjinda chakkuli dala unda nikleda?

eng: How long will this stay fresh?
How do I get to the temple from here?
Which way is the beach?
Is the railway station far from here?
Can I walk there or do I need an auto?
tu: yenk ade nadapoli ya ath rickshaw d povod apunda?

eng: How much does an auto to Udupi bus stand cost?
tu: udupi bus stand g auto d popinanda yeth apundu?

eng: Can you write the name in Kannada for me?
tu: yenk undu pudar n kannada d baredh korpara?

eng: Where can I find public restrooms?
Is this the road to the market?
Thank you for showing me the way!
Can you take me to the main market?
How much will you charge?
Can you turn on the meter, please?
Please stop here
Ill get down at the next junction
Can you wait for 10 minutes?
Do you know the way to Malpe Beach?
tu: Malpe beach g popina saadhi gottunde?

eng: Please drive slowly
Thats okay, keep the change
Thank you for the ride!
This place is so lively!
The people here are very friendly
What is this festival about?
Can I take a photo of this stall?
tu: undu angadi da photo deppoli ya?

eng: Where can I buy traditional clothes?
Is there a pharmacy nearby?
tu: kaithal d olpa la medical unda?

eng: Do you know any good restaurant here?
tu: ereg mulpa ovula yedde hotel gottunda?

eng: The weather is really nice today
Im just walking around to explore.
